text: William Xalco (born 14 June 1984) is a former Indian field hockey player who played as a defender for the national team. He was part of the Indian team that competed at the 2004 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== *Player profile at bharatiyahockey.org Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:People from Sundergarh district Category:Indian male field hockey players Category:Field hockey players from Odisha Category:Field hockey players at the 2004 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic field hockey players of India Category:Male field hockey defenders
title: William Xalco
